item.title: BananaPiget
item.author: aaron-zzz@outlook.com (Aaron)
item.description: Take a Look This morning I get my BananaPi M3. I bought it for a consideration that it may replace RaspberryPi 3B in our application in embedded digital image processing. Quate from offical website: > Banana Pi M3 is a super charged single board computer with an Octa-core processor and 2GB of RAM. Along side the elite processing unit, it features Gigabit Ethernet, 2 USB, SATA, WiFi, Bluetooth, and HDMI connection.
